software.description: The Brain Segmentation Testing Protocol (Neuroimage 2011, http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2...) is a freely available collection of MRI images for testing segmentation algorithms. The 312 MRI datasets may be downloaded to assess the accuracy, reproducibility and sensitivity of MRI segmentation software. The accuracy/validation dataset includes images from infants, adults and patients with Alzheimerâ€™s disease and the reproducibility dataset includes 9 subjects who have been scanned with 8 different sequences at 1.0T and 3.0T.
